name: Lord Bagra
effect: This card gets -2 boost cost when used to boost a Bagra Army card. If this card goes to the Training Area, discard it instead.

name: Metal Greymon
effect: Fusion - If this card is fused using Greymon, this card gets +300 power this turn.

name: Shoutmon X4
effect: Fusion - If this card is fused using Shoutmon, this card gets +300 power this turn.

name: Tactimon
effect: Battle - If your opponent has any Fusion Fighters or Bagra Army Digimon in the Battle Area, this card gets +200 power this turn.
